sen.e: In 1590, Nichiyu was invited when Nichigo of Konishi, Kazusa Province (present Shirasato-machi, Oami, Chiba Prefecture) founded Konishi danrin (school of Buddhism) in Shobo-ji Temple and became the founder of the danrin.
